name: eventbridgepoc
description: poc of event bridge for reference in internal blog

scripts.build: babel src -d build && npm run lint-fix
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file ../infrastructure_template.yaml --s3-bucket robertcurran-assorted-mess-userpool-backup --s3-prefix eventBridgePoc  --region eu-west-1 --output-template-file ../chat-packaged.yaml --profile robertCurranAccount
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ../chat-packaged.yaml --stack-name eventBridgePoc --region eu-west-1 --s3-bucket robertcurran-assorted-mess-userpool-backup --s3-prefix eventBridgePoc --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --profile robertCurranAccount
scripts.publish: npm run package && npm run deploy && echo Finished!! ðŸ¥³
